akn:section.akn:heading: Tax credit to Qualified High Technology Companies for retraining costs for qualified disadvantaged employees.

akn:content.akn:p: For taxable years beginning after December 31, 2000, a Qualified High Technology Company shall be allowed a credit against taxes imposed by ยง 47-1817.06 for expenditures paid or incurred during the taxable year for retraining of a qualified disadvantaged employee.

The credit claimed under this section shall be limited to $20,000 for each qualified disadvantaged employee during the first 18 months of employment.
